title: Champ Mastery Emote Bug
body:
I was playing a game as Kat, I had changed my skin to classic before getting level 5 champ mastery, I had been able to use the emote the whole time then when I changed the skin, my Icon AND emote were gone but my level didn't reset at all. Has this been a problem with any other people?
If it has is there a way to fix it.
P.S. I changed back the the skin I used to get to level 4 but the emote and icon were still not there for me.

replies.body:
This is a known bug and Riot are aware of it. Just hold tight and it should be resolved soon.

Edit: Confirmed fix coming out for Saturday.
Same problem, hopefully it is fixed soon :)
same for me but it works some games doesn't work others. champ trynd.
